description: Document specifies packages which can be exluded from license verification. As our code doesn't actually link to them. If no docker_images are provided the package is ignored for all images

docutils.notes: botocore imports the package only for dev use. See: https://github.com/boto/botocore/issues/900

ansible.notes: Used only for executing ansible as a utility via cmd interface

ansible-base.notes: Used only for executing ansible as a utility via cmd interface

pylint.notes: Used only for executing lint as a utility via cmd interface
